lines.text: You're going to have to use your brain which is going to hurt because it's the weakest muscle in your body.
I ought to teach you a lesson.
I'd like that. I have a thirst for knowledge; teach me.
A piece of advice, Never hurl in front of your woman. Something to live by.
To live is to love. All reasons against it. All instincts for it.

[after almost being eaten by a shark]
You know that story you told me, about Scar?
You're lucky, a hurricane on your first visit.
What do you want? I'm from Chicago, it's not like there were street signs.
I've been smoking up a storm. Uncle Porter lets me drink all the beer i want, he also knows a lot of loose women.
People who don't care wind up in a home drooling cream spinach
Here's the pizza. I see a Dolphin.
